    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String[] getInstByTask(CheapTransBuild trcs, String busiId)
      Get the last instance (bTable.wfState) id:
      select i.instId instId, b.taskId busiId, i.nodeId nodeId from tasks b join task_nodes i on i.taskId = b.taskId AND i.taskId = '000019' AND b.wfState = i.instId
      Note
      Should this been deprecated because current state is not will a step beginning if multiple outgoing branches are supported.?

      • getNode

      • getInstByTask

        public String[] getInstByTask(CheapTransBuild trcs,
                              String busiId)
                       throws io.odysz.transact.x.TransException,
                              SQLException
        Get the last instance (bTable.wfState) id:
        select i.instId instId, b.taskId busiId, i.nodeId nodeId from tasks b join task_nodes i on i.taskId = b.taskId AND i.taskId = '000019' AND b.wfState = i.instId
        Note
        Should this been deprecated because current state is not will a step beginning if multiple outgoing branches are supported.?

        deprecated

        Parameters:
        trcs -
        busiId -
        Returns:
        0: busiId(taskId), 1: instance-id (instabl.intId), 2: nodeId
        Throws:
        io.odysz.transact.x.TransException
        SQLException
